notes.text:
Don't overcook pork - it should be slightly pink
Let chops rest before serving
Granny Smith apples work wonderfully

steps.descr: Season pork chops generously with salt and pepper

on_enter.say: Right, let's get started by seasoning our pork chops generously with salt and pepper. This will really bring out the flavour!

steps.instructions: Season pork chops generously with salt and pepper

steps.descr: Pan-fry chops 4-5 minutes per side, set aside

on_enter.say: Now, let's pan-fry these beauties for 4-5 minutes on each side until they're golden brown. You'll hear that lovely sizzle!

steps.instructions: Pan-fry chops 4-5 minutes per side, set aside

steps.descr: In same pan, add butter and apple slices

on_enter.say: Brilliant! Now, in the same pan, let's add our butter and sliced apples. The aroma will be fantastic!

steps.instructions: In same pan, add butter and apple slices

on_enter.say: Time to cook those apples until they're beautifully caramelized. They'll turn a lovely golden colour and smell amazing!

steps.descr: Add sage, cider, and honey, simmer

on_enter.say: Let's add the sage, cider, and honey now. Give it a good stir and let it simmer for a few minutes. The flavours will meld beautifully!

steps.instructions: Add sage, cider, and honey, simmer

steps.descr: Return chops to pan, coat with sauce

on_enter.say: Right, let's return those chops to the pan and coat them with that lovely sauce. They'll soak up all those delicious flavours!

steps.instructions: Return chops to pan, coat with sauce

on_enter.say: Time to serve up! Pair these gorgeous pork chops with some creamy mashed potatoes. Enjoy your meal!

recipe.title: Pork Chops with Apples
recipe.description: Pan-seared pork chops with caramelized apples and sage
